title: IELTS Listening Part 2: Gym Introduction
text: Listen to the manager introducing the new gym facilities.

questions.prompt: The gym is located next to the __________.
questions.explanation: The manager says: 'we are located right next to the **Green Park**'.

questions.prompt: What time does the gym open on weekdays?
questions.explanation: He explicitly mentions: 'we open our doors at **5:30 am** on weekdays'.

questions.prompt: How much does the Gold membership cost per month?
questions.explanation: He states: 'our Gold membership, which costs **£45** per month'.

questions.prompt: What is the special offer for today?
questions.explanation: He says: 'if you sign up today, you pay **nothing** to join' (waiving the joining fee).

questions.prompt: Which item is forbidden in the main gym area?
questions.explanation: He warns: '**outdoor shoes** are strictly forbidden in the main gym area'.
